name: InstallBundletool
description: Install latest version available of bundletool
author: Damien Aicheh

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Github Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username from your github account. This is used to access the Github API to get the lastest available version of bundletool. If you don't specify it you will be limited by the defaults rate limits of the Github API.

inputs.name: personalAccessToken
inputs.label: Github Personal Access token
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is used to access the Github API to get the lastest available version of bundletool. To get your access token go to your Github account then Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens and click on Generate new token. Check only the public_repo access and generate it. Add it to your secure variables. If you don't specify it you will be limited by the defaults rate limits of the Github API.

inputs.name: ignorSslError
inputs.label: ignore ssl certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: if you have ssl error, set it to true

inputs.name: curlIsSilent
inputs.label: curl is silent
inputs.helpMarkDown: set it to false if you want to remove --silent for the curl command
